verses.verse: And these are the countries which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5157>inherited<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, distributed for <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> to them.

By <S%H1486>lot<s%> was their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, for the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, and for the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%>.

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and an <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H4294>tribe<s%> on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: but unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> none <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: therefore they <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H2506>part<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, save <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in, with their <S%H4054>suburbs<s%> for their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and for their <S%H7075>substance<s%>.
As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%>, and they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>came<s%> unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>: and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> concerning <S%H182>me<s%> and <S%H182>thee<s%> in <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%>.

<S%H705>Forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was I when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me from <S%H6947>Kadeshbarnea<s%> to espy <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; and I <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as it was in mine <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

Nevertheless my <S%H251>brethren<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with me made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4529>melt<s%>: but I <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Surely the <S%H776>land<s%> whereon thy <S%H7272>feet<s%> have <S%H1869>trodden<s%> shall be thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, because thou hast <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And now, behold, the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath kept me <S%H2421>alive<s%>, as he <S%H1696>said<s%>, these <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, even <S%H227>since<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, while the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>wandered<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and now, lo, I am this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>. wandered: Heb. walked

As yet I am as <S%H2389>strong<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> as I was in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me: as my <S%H3581>strength<s%> was then, even so is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> now, for <S%H4421>war<s%>, both to go <S%H3318>out<s%>, and to come <S%H935>in<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> me this <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, whereof the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>; for thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> how the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%> were there, and that the <S%H5892>cities<s%> were <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>fenced<s%>: if so <S%H194>be<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will be <S%H854>with<s%> me, then I shall be able to drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

<S%H2275>Hebron<s%> therefore became the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenezite<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, because that he <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> was <S%H7153>Kirjatharba<s%>; which Arba was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war<s%>.
